title: GitHub Copilot â€” AI Tool Review
description: GitHub Copilot is Microsoft's AI pair programmer that provides real-time code suggestions across all major IDEs, trained on billions of lines of code. GitHub Copilot is the original AI pair programmer, developed by GitHub and OpenAI. It offers real-time code completions, function generation from comments, and now a full chat interface in IDEs. Available in VS Code, Visual Studio, JetBrains, Neovim, and more. Copilot Enterprise adds codebase indexing for large organizations. Free for verified students and open-source maintainers. Highlights: Widest IDE support. Real-time inline suggestions. GitHub repository integration. Free for students and OSS maintainers. Multi-language support.
